content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Over nearly six years of EPAM’s work with Epic Games, a certain set of rules has emerged/ been established.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Seemingly unimportant trivialities, they, like all cultural particularities, play an important role in strengthening our partnership.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please read them carefully and make sure you use them in your daily communication with the Client.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1. Your outlook signature should be set properly before you start your first communication with the Client. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please make sure you confirm its look with your Lead before you click that 'Send' button.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. There is a special Slack chat where all access issues should be addressed to be handled in the most productive way.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3. For most of the Epic Games teams, the time slot from 12 pm till 1 pm (local time) is an 'official' lunch hour, and that is why we kindly ask you not to request meetings during this time.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4. Fridays are meeting-free at EPIC. It is recommended to avoid setting up anything regular on Fridays.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5. Time Zone Discrepancies. Normally\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", the time difference between US and UA is as follows:\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ukraine is 7 hours ahead of the East Coast, which works in accordance to EST\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (Eastern Standard Time) and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10 hours ahead of the West Coast, which operates on PST\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (Pacific Standard Time).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Daylight savings time (winter/summer time) causes some differences, as Ukraine typically adopts it a week earlier than most of the states (\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.timeanddate.com/time/change/usa\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Time Change 2020 in the United States\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"). Within that period,\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ukraine is 6 hours ahead of EST\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"9 hours ahead of PST\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" The key takeaways for us are as follows:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1. The team in Ukraine\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Review meetings with Epic Games where EPAM is a participant or organizer. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For that specific week only,\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" those arrangements should be held \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"one hour earlier/later compared to the previous week.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If there is no shift in the schedule, this means that the meeting has been set up using EEST. If EPAM is an organizer of such a meeting, the time zone should be changed to EST and the time value adjusted accordingly. If EPAM is a participant, the organizer should be notified, so that they can make the changes listed above. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This is important\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" because usually \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Epic Games stakeholders’ calendars are double or triple booked,\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" so \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"if EPAM doesn’t make this amendment\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", there is a high chance that the Epic participants EPAM expect to come \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"won’t join the meeting\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The internal meetings schedule should be adjusted if there are overlaps due to the change in time difference.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. The team in the US\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The US team should collaborate with the team in Ukraine if any schedule amendments are needed\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3. Teams in Belarus and Armenia.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These countries stopped observing daylight saving time some time ago, though EPAM members still may experience shifts in meetings with the team in Ukraine, as well as some changes in the timing of online calls with US colleagues starting around November 1st.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4. Other Locations: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"there should be no changes in meetings scheduled with Epic Games stakeholders in Helsinki and UK, as both countries make the shift to daylight savings time at the same time as Ukraine.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":212446,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/93906699-3f4f-48dc-859e-16f57f9af4fa/image2021-4-6_12-57-0.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/93906699-3f4f-48dc-859e-16f57f9af4fa/image2021-4-6_12-57-0.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"image2021-4-6_12-57-0.png\",\"name\":\"image2021-4-6_12-57-0.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"93906699-3f4f-48dc-859e-16f57f9af4fa\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":340,\"height\":356},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
